title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), and for the purpose of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Renewable
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Renewable 

Energy) (Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

Amendment of Regulation 15 of European Union (Renewable Energy) 
Regulations 2014
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (renewable energy) (amendment) regulation 2020 amendment regulation 15 european union (renewable energy) regulation 2014

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), and for the purpose of
heading: 2. Regulation 15 of the European Union (Renewable Energy) Regulations
text_raw:
2. Regulation 15 of the European Union (Renewable Energy) Regulations 
2014 (S.I. No. 483 of 2014) is amended by the insertion of the following 
paragraphs after paragraph (1): 

“(2) For the purpose of ensuring compliance with the national overall target 
for the share of energy from renewable sources in respect of the State referred 
to in Article 3(1) of, and Part A of Annex I to, the Directive, the Minister may 
apply the measures referred to in Article 3(3)(b), and as provided for in Article 
6, of the Directive, arrange for the statistical transfer of a specified amount of 
energy from renewable sources from other Member States to the State and may 
take any other such steps as are necessary for that purpose. 

(3) The expenses and expenditure incurred by the Minister in the performance 
of his or her functions under paragraph (2) shall, to such extent as may be 
sanctioned by the Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform, be paid out of 
monies provided by the Oireachtas.”. 

1 OJ No. L. 140, 5.6.2009, p. 16 
2 OJ No. L. 239, 15.9.2015, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [524] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 November 2020. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [524]

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), and for the purpose of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These regulations modify Regulation 15 of European Union (Renewable 
Energy) Regulations 2014 with respect to the measures referred to in Article 6 
of Directive (EU) 2009/28. The regulations provide for the necessary 
arrangements for the statistical transfer of a specified amount of energy from 
renewable sources from other Member States to the State and related 
expenditure incurred. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [524] 5
